sentences.en: a political system based on the notions of equality and liberty
sentences.cn: 建立在自由平等观念基础上的政治体系

sentences.en: All people have the right to equality of opportunity.
sentences.cn: 人人都有获得均等机会的权利。

sentences.en: He only wants freedom, justice and equality.
sentences.cn: 他只要自由、公正和平等。

sentences.en: His ideas on equality are viewed as utopian in the current political climate.
sentences.cn: 在当前的政治气候下,他关于平等的观点被认为是乌托邦.

sentences.en: People who believe in equality are not desirable teachers for Natives.
sentences.cn: 信奉平等者不宜成为教土著人的教师.
种族 / 社会 / 男女平等

sentences.en: She says women must do more to gain economic equality.
sentences.cn: 她说妇女必须要付出更多才能赢得经济上的平等。

sentences.en: She was herself a vehement protagonist of sexual equality.
sentences.cn: 她本人就热心提倡男女平等.

sentences.en: The Commission for Racial Equality teaches organisations not to discriminate.
sentences.cn: 种族平等委员会告诫各家机构不要心存歧视。

sentences.en: The female role has been downgraded altogether in the drive for greater equality.
sentences.cn: 在争取更多平等的运动中，女性角色完全被贬低了。

sentences.en: There are no all-embracing EC directives on race equality.
sentences.cn: 关于种族平等，欧盟指令也无法面面俱到。

sentences.en: These women are demanding fairness and equality in their pay.
sentences.cn: 这些妇女要求在薪酬方面的公正和平等.

sentences.en: They are fighting for the equality of women.
sentences.cn: 她们在为争取男女平等而奋斗.

sentences.en: They have long been involved in a crusade for racial equality.
sentences.cn: 长期以来他们一直致力于争取种族平等的运动.

sentences.en: They live and work together in complete equality and brotherhood.
sentences.cn: 他们完全平等和兄弟般地在一起生活和工作.

sentences.en: We talk glibly of equality of opportunity.
sentences.cn: 我们信口开河地谈论机会均等问题。

sentences.en: Where there is equality there can be sanity.
sentences.cn: 凡是有平等的地方,就有神志清醒.

words.tran_cn: 同样地；相等地，平等地；公平地
对手；匹敌；同辈；相等的事物
补偿器；补偿电路；平衡装置（等于equalizer）
均衡器，[电] 平衡器；平衡装置；使相等的东西
使相等（equalize的过去时和过去分词）
使均衡；使平等；均分；补足（等于equalize）

trans.tran_cn: （社会地位、待遇上的）平等；均等，相等
trans.tran_en: a situation in which people have the same rights, advantages etc
